mapper.insert:
Select nextval('T_CAR_DECISION_SEQ') From dual
insert into T_CAR_DECISION(id,app_id,type,amount,contract_amount,belong_channel,product,first_test_code,second_test_code,second_test_value,period,decision,remarks,decision_code1,decision_code2,decision_code3,decision_code4,decision_code5,decision_code6,image_summarys,return_msg,state,operator,org_id,create_time,update_time) values( #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{appId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{amount, jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{contractAmount, jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{belongChannel, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{product, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{firstTestCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{secondTestCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{secondTestValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{period, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{decision, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{remarks, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{decisionCode1, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{decisionCode2, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{decisionCode3, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{decisionCode4, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{decisionCode5, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{decisionCode6, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{imageSummarys, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{returnMsg, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{state, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{operator, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{orgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update T_CAR_DECISION set
app_id = #{appId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount, jdbcType=DOUBLE},
contract_amount = #{contractAmount, jdbcType=DOUBLE},
belong_channel = #{belongChannel, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product = #{product, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
first_test_code = #{firstTestCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
second_test_code = #{secondTestCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
second_test_value = #{secondTestValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
period = #{period, jdbcType=INTEGER},
decision = #{decision, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
decision_code1 = #{decisionCode1, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
decision_code2 = #{decisionCode2, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
decision_code3 = #{decisionCode3, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
decision_code4 = #{decisionCode4, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
decision_code5 = #{decisionCode5, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
decision_code6 = #{decisionCode6, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image_summarys = #{imageSummarys, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
return_msg = #{returnMsg, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator = #{operator, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_id = #{orgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id}
